bill.summary:
Senior Citizens' Freedom to Work Act of 2019
This bill eliminates provisions that reduce Social Security benefits for certain beneficiaries who have outside income. Currently, benefits are reduced for Social Security beneficiaries who are younger than full retirement age if they earn more than $17,640 in outside income in a year.
